Phases.Strategy:
When you first walk into the boss arena an only an enemy called the Lunatic Priest will be here once this enemy reaches 50% HP he will summon the Pyscheflayer. Players should focus on killing the Lunatic Priest before dealing with the Psycheflayer as the Lunatic Priest will throw out high damage AOEs. 

Throughout the fight Psycheflayer will spawn adds that cast AOEs players should make sure to kill them as soon as they spawn.

Mechanics.Name: Water
Mechanics.Description: Targetted attack that deals small damage

Mechanics.Name: Canker
Mechanics.Description: Targetted attack that inflicts the Disease debuff

Phases.Strategy:
The Demon Wall will always follow a pattern, it will always use Liquefy four times before using repel. 

After two uses of Repel the demon wall will summon two Adds called Bloodlapper that can inflict the Paralysis debuff, make sure to kill them as soon as they spawn.

Mechanics.Name: Muder Hole
Mechanics.Description: Targeted attack that deals a small amount of damage

Mechanics.Name: Repel
Mechanics.Description: After the Demon Wall finishes casting repel all players will be knocked back away from the boss.

Mechanics.Name: Liquefy
Mechanics.Description: Line AOE that can come from the two sides of the platform or the middle. It deals high damage and will inflict the Heavy debuff if hit by the middle AOE & the Slow debuff if hit by the side AOE

Phases.Strategy: Throughout the fight Anantaboga will use Imminent Catastrophe to spawn red orbs that deal damage to anyone in line of sight, to avoid this players must hide behind on of 4 statues around the arena. Additionally, the cast will awake one of the statues turning it into an add, players must kill the add and avoid its AOEs

Mechanics.Name: Tail Drive
Mechanics.Description: Rear cone AOE that will deal high damage and inflict the Concussion debuff causing damage over time to anyone hit

Mechanics.Name: Rotten Breath
Mechanics.Description: Frontal cone AOE that deals high damage and will inflict the Disease debuff to anyone hit

Mechanics.Name: Imminent Catastrophe
Mechanics.Description: After the cast a red orb will appear in the middle of the arena and deal high damage to anyone in line of sight

Mechanics.Name: Plague Dance
Mechanics.Description: Purple beam on a random player after aa while a red orb will appear at the location of the player hit and deal damage to anyone around it
